title: User Registration with Email/Password
description: Verify that a new user can successfully register using a valid email and password.

steps.description: Navigate to the Signup page.
Input valid email address.
Input valid password meeting complexity requirements.
Submit the signup form.
Check that user receives a confirmation and is redirected to next step or logged in.

title: User Registration with Invalid Email
description: Verify that the signup form validates and rejects invalid email formats.

steps.description: Navigate to the Signup page.
Input invalid email format (e.g., 'user@com').
Input valid password.
Submit the signup form.
Verify that an appropriate validation error message is displayed preventing submission.

title: User Login with Email/Password
description: Validate that registered users can successfully log in using email and password.

steps.description: Navigate to Login page.
Input registered email and correct password.
Click login button.
Confirm user is successfully authenticated and redirected to Dashboard.

title: Login Failure with Incorrect Password
description: Ensure login fails gracefully when incorrect password is provided.

steps.description: Navigate to Login page.
Input valid email and incorrect password.
Click login button.
Verify an error message is shown indicating invalid credentials.

title: User Login with Google OAuth
description: Verify users can authenticate using Google OAuth and be redirected to Dashboard.

steps.description: Navigate to Login page.
Click on Google OAuth login button.
Complete Google authentication flow with valid Google account.
Confirm successful login and redirection to Dashboard.

title: Session Persistence after Login
description: Validate that user session persists across page reloads and browser tabs.

steps.description: Log in as a registered user.
Reload the Dashboard page.
Confirm user remains logged in and Dashboard data is accessible.
Open a new browser tab and navigate to Dashboard.
Verify user session is active with no need to log in again.

title: Access Protected Routes without Authentication
description: Ensure users are redirected to Login page when accessing protected routes without valid authentication.

steps.description: Navigate directly to /dashboard URL without logging in.
Verify redirection to Login page.
Navigate directly to /reports URL without logging in.
Verify redirection to Login page.

title: Dashboard 3D Visualizations Rendering
description: Verify that Carbon Molecule and EarthGlobe 3D visualizations render correctly with smooth animations.

steps.description: Log in and navigate to the Dashboard page.
Check that 3D components Carbon Molecule and EarthGlobe appear and animate smoothly without errors.
Verify that 3D visualizations update in real-time with emitted data changes.

title: Real-Time Emissions Data Display
description: Validate the real-time monitoring module updates monthly trend charts and recent activity feed accurately.

steps.description: Log in and access Dashboard.
Verify monthly trend charts display correct emissions data for the current and previous months.
Check recent activity feed lists latest user actions and emissions updates.

title: Carbon Footprint Calculation for Individual
description: Confirm the Individual Carbon Calculator provides accurate output for various input scenarios including edge cases.

steps.description: Navigate to Calculators page and select Individual Calculator.
Input valid individual emission data for all required fields.
Submit and calculate footprint.
Check calculation result matches expected values.
Input zero or minimal values to test edge cases.
Verify calculator handles edge inputs without errors and returns valid output.

title: Carbon Footprint Calculation for Business and Corporate
description: Verify Business and Corporate calculators compute emissions correctly based on provided inputs and Indian emission factors.

steps.description: Navigate to Calculators page and select Business Calculator.
Input sample business emission data including Indian state for emission factors.
Calculate and verify results are correct.
Repeat process for Corporate Calculator.
Confirm outputs respect state-wise emission factor selection and GST validation.

title: BRSR Report PDF Generation and Download
description: Verify that users can generate BRSR compliance reports and download them as correctly formatted PDFs.

steps.description: Log in and navigate to Reports page.
Input necessary data or use emissions data.
Trigger report generation.
Confirm a PDF document is generated with correct structure, tables, and data.
Download the generated PDF.
Verify PDF opens correctly and formatting matches BRSR regulatory requirements.

title: Marketplace Carbon Credits Purchase Flow
description: Ensure users can browse, select, and purchase verified carbon credits with accurate certification badges.

steps.description: Navigate to Marketplace page.
Verify list of carbon credit offers show certification badges.
Select a carbon credit product and proceed to purchase.
Complete purchase with valid payment information.
Confirm transaction succeeds and purchase details are updated in user account.

title: GST Number Validation and State-Wise Emission Factor Selection
description: Validate GST number input field and ensure state-wise emission factor selection is accurate and conforms to Indian standards.

steps.description: Navigate to any form requiring GST validation.
Enter various valid and invalid GST numbers.
Verify validation messages appear appropriately for incorrect GST formats.
Select different Indian states from emission factor dropdown.
Confirm emitted calculations reflect selected state emission factors correctly.

title: Sustainability Quiz Participation and Scoring
description: Verify users can complete the Sustainability Quiz, receive scores, and get relevant recommendations.

steps.description: Navigate to Sustainability Quiz page.
Answer all quiz questions.
Submit quiz responses.
Confirm final score is calculated and displayed.
Check AI-based sustainability recommendations are shown based on user answers.

title: Consultation Booking Workflow
description: Ensure users can book consultation sessions through the integrated booking system without errors.

steps.description: Navigate to Consultation page.
Select date, time, and consultation type.
Submit booking request.
Verify booking confirmation message and recorded appointment details.

title: AI-Powered Insights Generation
description: Validate AI recommendations are relevant, actionable, and tailored to user emissions data.

steps.description: Log in and access Dashboard.
Check AI-powered insights are displayed.
Ensure recommendations correspond to current emissions data and suggest feasible sustainability actions.

title: Reports Page Input Validation
description: Verify that inputs on the Reports page are properly validated, and errors are handled gracefully.

steps.description: Navigate to Reports page.
Enter incomplete or invalid data for report parameters.
Attempt to generate report.
Confirm validation errors are shown and report generation is blocked.

title: UI Responsiveness on Mobile Devices
description: Test that UI components, including 3D visualizations and dashboards, adapt and remain usable on mobile screen sizes.

steps.description: Open the application on various mobile devices or emulator.
Verify that menus, buttons, charts, and 3D visualizations scale correctly with no clipping or overflow.
Confirm touch interactions work as expected and system remains responsive.

title: Quick Actions Buttons Functionality
description: Validate that quick action buttons on Dashboard trigger intended workflows without error.

steps.description: Log in and navigate to Dashboard.
Click on each quick action button available.
Confirm each button initiates the correct process or navigation without error.
